sentences.en: "Is this a painting by Picasso?" "Yes, it is."
an exhibition of ceramics by Picasso
Have you seen the Picasso exhibition?
sentences.cn: 你看过毕加索的画展吗？

sentences.en: He is a great admirer of Picasso's early paintings.
sentences.cn: 他十分赞赏毕加索的早期画作。

sentences.en: He paints in the fashion of Picasso.
sentences.cn: 他仿效毕加索的风格画画.

sentences.en: His style is reminiscent of Picasso's.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术风格很像毕加索的.

sentences.en: In 1925, Picasso began to explore an uncharted world.
sentences.cn: 1925年, 毕加索开始探索尚未被描绘的世界.

sentences.en: Is the painting a genuine Picasso?
sentences.cn: 这幅画是毕加索的真迹吗？

sentences.en: Picasso was born a phenomenon of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 毕加索生来就是二十世纪的一位非凡人物.

sentences.en: Picasso went away for the summer. When he returned he went at once to the unfinished picture in the corner of his studio.
sentences.cn: 毕加索外出了一整个夏天，刚返回他就来到了画室一角那幅尚未完成的画前，凭着记忆头像很快完成了。

sentences.en: She claimed to be the greatest living fan of Picasso.
sentences.cn: 这位姑娘声称自己是活着的头号毕加索迷。

sentences.en: The conceit of the man -- comparing his own work with Picasso's!
sentences.cn: 这个自高自大的人 -- 竟把自己的作品跟毕加索的相比!

sentences.en: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

sentences.en: The most valuable item on show will be a Picasso drawing.
sentences.cn: 展览会上最贵重的展品是毕加索的一幅素描。

sentences.en: The museum has just acquired a famous painting by Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 该美术馆刚刚获得一幅毕加索的名画.

sentences.en: The painter modeled his style after that of Picasso.
sentences.cn: 这位画家模仿毕加索的绘画风格.

sentences.en: This picture is not really by Picasso. It is a forgery.
sentences.cn: 这张画并非毕加索画的, 是伪造品.

phrases.tran_cn: 巴勃罗·毕加索，当代西方最有创造性和影响最深远的艺术家
